sample_scenarios.name: Normal Operations - Low Risk
sample_scenarios.description: Standard hospital operations with adequate capacity

sample_scenarios.name: Moderate Surge - Medium Risk
sample_scenarios.description: Festival period with elevated patient influx expected

data.incident_description: Increased emergency calls due to festival celebrations
data.major_news_summary: Festival celebrations across the city, moderate air quality concerns

sample_scenarios.name: Critical Surge - High Risk
sample_scenarios.description: Major incident with severe capacity constraints

data.incident_description: Major highway accident with multiple casualties, mass casualty event declared
data.major_news_summary: Breaking: Major multi-vehicle accident on National Highway 1. Multiple casualties reported. Emergency services deployed.

sample_scenarios.name: Air Quality Crisis - High Risk
sample_scenarios.description: Severe air pollution causing respiratory emergencies

data.incident_description: Increased respiratory distress cases due to severe air pollution
data.major_news_summary: Air quality reaches hazardous levels. Health advisory issued for vulnerable populations.

sample_scenarios.name: Weekend Festival - Medium Risk
sample_scenarios.description: New Year's Eve with expected celebrations and incidents

data.incident_description: New Year's Eve: Multiple alcohol-related incidents and minor injuries
data.major_news_summary: Large gatherings expected for New Year celebrations. Police on high alert.

sample_scenarios.name: Supply Shortage Alert
sample_scenarios.description: Normal patient load but critical supply levels low

data.incident_description: Supply chain delays affecting medication and equipment inventory

expected_result.note: Risk elevated due to supply shortages despite low patient load

field_descriptions.hospital_id: Unique identifier for the hospital (e.g., MED-CENTRAL-001)
field_descriptions.beds_total: Total number of beds in the hospital
field_descriptions.expected_free_time: Array of ISO timestamps when additional beds will become available
field_descriptions.doctors_on_shift: Number of doctors currently on duty
field_descriptions.nurses_on_shift: Number of nurses currently on duty
field_descriptions.key_meds: JSON object with medication names and quantities
field_descriptions.incoming_emergencies: Number of emergency cases expected or en route
field_descriptions.incident_description: Free text description of current situation
field_descriptions.festival_name: Name of ongoing festival or major event
field_descriptions.major_news_summary: Brief summary of major news affecting the region
